description: HACIA UNA REFORMA FISCAL INCLUYENTE EN MEXICO

subproject.corporate outcome: Inclusive growth and social equity promoted through pro-poor macroeconomic and fiscal policies that support income, employment and social protection of  youth, women and vulnerable groups in a sustainable way
subproject.description: Publication and dissemination of the document "Las Mujeres y el presupuesto" and a data base analysing the existing relationship between inequity in different spheres and the distribution of public expenditure.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: REFORMA FISCAL INCLUYENTE
